channel.title: The Legendary Swordsman [Neutral Class] not serius fanmade
channel.description:
**The Legendary Swordsman** Neutral offensive/supp
**Swordsman of Legends (Passive)** Death immune as long as your not occcupied **Protective (Passive)** You will protect your trainee when you are training with him making all abilites targeting him to be targeting you instead.
**Claiming a Favor (Day)** Claim a favor the king ows you force pardoning your trainee and making him unable to be voted up again today. **Start Training (Day)** Take your trainee to your training ground tonight giving him new abilites for the night. -unlimited uses 1 day cooldown.
**Spar (Night)** Spar with a player occuping them and informing you if there a offensive or killer class example; if there not it will say they have no potential if there killer it will say the look in there eyes there movements the are a killer class if there a offensive class it will say there defensive tactics there rough hands the are a offensive class- Infinite uses **Recruit (Night)** make a offensive or killer class your trainee in edition to there normal class does not work on magic users. -2 uses. will commit suicide if this ability has no charge left and your trainee is dead. you may only have 1 trainee at a time Wincon: see your trainee finish all his training
**The Trainee** offensive/killer class facation based on what he is converted **In training (Passive)** During nights where **Start training** is used you need to use your night abilites (this passive replaces your currents passive expect retrubution) **Will Training (Night)** Become occupy and redirection immune but you are occupied the following night bypasses occupy immunity -1 use. After using this ability it is replaced with **Endurens Training** **Endurens Training (Night)** Become death immune but you will bleed and die in 1 day if you are not healed -1 use. after using this ability its replaced with **Combat Training** **Combat Training (Night)** Your attacks now bypass death immunty but you cannot attack player during the next night-1 use. If you dont have a ability wich can attack a player your first ability is replaced with **Strike** instead and you gain another charge of this ability **Strike (Night)** Kill a player- infinite uses

item.title: The Legendary Swordsman [Neutral Class] not serius fanmade
item.dc:creator: justaneut
item.description:
The Legendary Swordsman Neutral offensive/supp

Swordsman of Legends (Passive) Death immune as long as your not occcupied
Protective (Passive) You will protect your trainee when you are training with him making all abilites targeting him to be targeting you instead.

Claiming a Favor (Day) Claim a favor the king ows you force pardoning your trainee and making him unable to be voted up again today.
Start Training (Day) Take your trainee to your training ground tonight giving him new abilites for the night. -unlimited uses 1 day cooldown.

Spar (Night) Spar with a player occuping them and informing you if there a offensive or killer class
example; if there not it will say they have no potential
if there killer it will say the look in there eyes there movements the are a killer class
if there a offensive class it will say there defensive tactics there rough hands the are a offensive class- Infinite uses
Recruit (Night) make a offensive or killer class your trainee in edition to there normal class does not work on magic users. -2 uses. will commit suicide if this ability has no charge left and your trainee is dead. you may only have 1 trainee at a time
Wincon: see your trainee finish all his training

The Trainee offensive/killer class facation based on what he is converted
In training (Passive) During nights where Start training is used you need to use your night abilites (this passive replaces your currents passive expect retrubution)
Will Training (Night) Become occupy and redirection immune but you are occupied the following night bypasses occupy immunity -1 use. After using this ability it is replaced with Endurens Training
Endurens Training (Night) Become death immune but you will bleed and die in 1 day if you are not healed -1 use. after using this ability its replaced with Combat Training
Combat Training (Night) Your attacks now bypass death immunty but you cannot attack player during the next night-1 use. If you dont have a ability wich can attack a player your first ability is replaced with Strike instead and you gain another charge of this ability
Strike (Night) Kill a player- infinite uses
